mapper.select: select c.comment_idx, c.feed_idx, c.member_idx, c.comment_content, c.comment_like_count, c.comment_date, m.member_id, m.member_img, trunc((sysdate-c.comment_date) * 24 * 60) as comment_date_minute from catstagram_comment c, catstagram_member m where c.member_idx = m.member_idx and feed_idx = #{feed_idx} order by c.comment_date asc
